stanza.line: Thy gift thy tables are within mybrain
Which shall above that idle rankremain
Beyond all date even to eternity
Or at the least so long as brain andheart
Till each to razed oblivion yield hispart
Of thee thy record never can bemissed
That poor retention could not so muchhold
Nor need I tallies thy dear love toscore
Therefore to give them from me was Ibold
To trust those tables that receive theemore
To keep an adjunct to rememberthee
